Alice mentioned the participation of high-profile NBA stars like Steph Curry but did not provide specific examples of inclusivity. Bob highlighted mental health struggles among athletes but also did not cite specific evidence to substantiate his claims. Therefore, the debate lacks strong evidence from both sides.
